Welcome to BuyMyVM,

We are providing High Grade VPS and Dedicated Servers at an Affordable price.

NOTE:-We are not new to Hosting business. We were incorporated with GoldLineHost and Dream Tera Hosting.

WHOIS Information is Available by WHOIS providers. Eg [https://easywhois.com/](https://www.easywhois.com/).

**Benefits Choosing Us**

*24/7/365 Premium Live Chat Support

*Up to 10 Gbps burstable speed servers.

*99.999% up time Gurenteed.

*3 Day Money back Gurenteed.

*US/UK Datacenter Locations.

*All Transactions are 256-Bit Encrypted.

*COMODO Certified Website.
